bookTitle: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century: The Complete Newspaper Dailies Volume 8
bookSeries: Buck Rogers: The Complete Newspaper Dailies #8
Plot: The saga of Buck Rogers in the 25th Century , the world's most famous science-fiction newspaper strip, continues with Volume 8 of Hermes Press' critically acclaimed, complete reprint of this ground-breaking title. Included in this volume are two more years of the strip, from 1940 to 1941, featuring three complete adventures ("Forgotten Earth Colony," "Thrown Back 500 Years," and "Goddess of Stygia"). Volume 8 also features a special 10-page introductory essay detailing interesting details about the history of the strip and its impact on science and science-fiction.
